content: salem page 5 errata posted 11/14/08 print version *a colorful crocheted coverlet is pieced together from swirled hexagons worked in coordinating shades berroco * from berroco booklet #273 skill level intermediate materials berroco weekend dk 100 grs 5 hanks #2976 dark denim 6 hanks #2964 curry 5 hanks #2957 grape 3 hanks #2971 squash and 3 hanks # 2965 terra cotta originally shown in berroco naturlin 50 grs 11 hanks #6335 indigo 13 hanks #6312 maize 10 hanks #6330 beet root 7 hanks #6310 maté and 7 hanks #6315 coriander crochet hook size 4 00 mm f or size to obtain gauge safety pin for marker assembly diagram is provided love free patterns sign up for our weekly newsletter 1 and you ll have access to all of our free friday patterns 1 http //www berroco com/knitbits-newsletter
